MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KY2 postcode area of Kirkcaldy. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 12:30am to safely carry repair work on the underground cable fault on Barassie Drive and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:30am. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:02am on 16th January 2021.
